runs.comm: On a length outside off, a little bit of away movement. Sibanda lets that one go.
slightly closer to off, Shehzad tries to defend and misses
short of length outside off, defended on the front foot
length ball outside off, defended in the crease
flighted on off, driven down to mid-on for a single
angling down after pitching on leg
pitches it on length on leg again, steered to midwicket for a single
pitched outside leg and goes down further for a wide
length ball around off and angling away, defended on the back foot
length ball on off, driven with a thick inside edge to deep square leg
short and outside off, pulled with not much follow through to the cow corner and a dive in the deep from Chigumbura saves Zimbabwe a run
pitches outside leg and Jamshed plays it off his pads fine past the keeper

similar shot and this time he's been taken. It pitched outside leg and Jamshed played it off his pads again, but handed a straight catch to Brian Vitori at short fine leg. Chatara strikes after giving nine runs in the first four balls
short of length well outside off, Hafeez lets it go
length ball on off, defended to cover for a quick single
short ball on leg and goes down with some swing for a wide
length ball on off, driven to mid-off off the front foot
short of length on off and it moves away this time, left alone by Hafeez
short of length on leg and goes down again for a wide
length ball on the pads, pushed on the on side
length ball on leg, driven to midwicket
full and well outside off, driven firmly after leaning forward and they get a single after a misfield at cover
pitches on leg and yet another wide. A stifled appeal from Chatara for caught behind but he umpire doesn't move
full on the pads, driven wide of deep square leg for an easy couple
Chatara has one more! He pitched is short this time outside off and it was angled in, Hafeez cut it hard and edges it to Taylor who dives to his right and the ball sticks to his right glove
full on off, driven down to mid-off
full and well outside off this time, left alone for a wide
full and just outside off, driven down to mid-off
short of length on leg and Umar Amin tries to pull but he is crammed up for room and misses it
short of length on off, tucked to backward square leg for a single
length ball outside off with a hit on swing and Amin is beaten
fuller on the stumps, Amin plucks it out and drives it to mid-on
length ball on off, pushed tentatively to the left of mid-on
full on the pads, tucked away off the pads for a single
short ball around off, Amin pulls but can't time it properly and manages a single
half volley well outside off and Shehzad drives it straight to cover
well outside off and Chatara gives another wide
slightly short outside off and pulled beautifully this time. He went back a bit and timed it properly for a four
length ball outside off, Amin guides it to third man
short of length outside off, left alone
full on the stumps and Shehzad comes down the ground to drive it handsomely for a four. This one raced to the fence
length ball on off, pushed back down the ground
slightly slower and short on ball outside off, tucked to square leg for a single
short of length and pushed down to long-on
round the wicket to Amin, it was pitched up and Amin chipped it down straight down the ground
length ball on the stumps, tucked on the on side for a single
flighted full toss and only driven to long-on
flatter and straight on the stumps, Amin comes down and pushes it back to the bowler
full on off, driven past cover for a single
length ball on the pads, tucked away to deep square leg for a single
length ball outside off, driven past cover off the front foot
short of length on leg, this one stops a bit before the batsman who defends it by going back
length ball on off, angling away, driven through the covers
very short and well outside off, Shehzad lets it go for a wide
slightly full on off, steered towards midwicket for a couple
full on off, driven down the ground to long-off and it brings up Pakistan's 50
flighted full toss outside off, driven square of the wicket

round the wicket, and Zimbabwe have another. It was flatter and Amin tried to sweep it away from his body and lost his balance. A leading edge goes up in the air and Taylor goes back to take a good running catch
short and flat towards off, tucked away on the leg side easily for a single
flater and angled in, pushed to midwicket
length ball outside off, pushed back to the bowler
flat and well outside off, Maqsood swings his arms and misses
flighted well outside off, driven to cover
full on off, pushed to cover
slightly short outside off, cut past point off the back foot
full on the stumps, defended on the front foot
short of length on middle, Shehzad comes down and punches it past the bowler for two
length ball on the stumps, tucked to deep midwicket for a single
full on the pads, it hit him donw the leg side as the batsman missed
length ball on the stumps, defended by Shehzad
full toss on the pads, steered fine to short fine leg
flat and short, Maqsood comes down and cant get it past midwicket
quicker and right on the toes, pushed pack to the bowler
full toss outside off and Maqsood drives it down in the air but it falls just short of the long-on fielder, for a single
full, well outside off and Maqsood opens his arms and slashes it just over long-on for a six
length ball outside off, driven past cover for a single
length ball outside off and Sheszad comes to the off down on one knee and scoops it over short fine leg for a four
short and slow this time and Shehzad cashes in by pulling it just past short fine leg. Another boundary
low full toss on off, driven down to long-on
short ball and it was angling in, pulled to deep backward square leg for a couple
short of length and slow outside off, Maqsood cut it late past short third man for three
full on the pads, steered to deep square leg for a quick couple, Pakistan have run very well today thanks to slow fielding in the outfield
full on middle and leg, driven down to long-on
full on the stumps, driven down the ground for an easy single
slow and low full toss from the back of the hand, a single to deep midwicket
full on the pads again, driven to the left of deep midwicket for two more, 13 off the over
short of length outside off, driven to sweeper cover
flat and wide outside off, Shehzad cuts it late past short third man for a four, poor delivery from Williams
straighter and on length, Shehzad comes down and swings his bat only for a single on the leg side
Maqsood came down the track to clear the in-field but an outside edge gives him a four in the third man area
length ball on the pads, Maqsood goes back and pushes it to long-on
length ball on middle and leg, tucked on the on side for an easy single
full and outside off, driven to sweeper cover for a single
short ball on off, Maqsood goes back and pulls it handsomely for a big six over the square leg boundary
Sibanda has taken a great running catch. It was pitched up and Maqsood drove it straight down the ground in the air and Sibanda ran about 15-20 yards to his right from long-off for a well-timed catch
slower ball well outside off and Shehzad almost scoops it between point and short third man for a four to bring up his fifty
short ball on the stumps, pulled easily for a single
short again and hooked towards deep fine leg for a single
full, straight and angled in, Afridi tried to work it towards midwicket but missed and took a leg bye
short of length on off, tucked to deep midwicket for two, good running again from Pakistan
full on the stumps, Shehzad smashes it over the deep midwicket boundary for a six! From the meat of the bat
full toss outside off, tucked to midwicket for a single
short ball and Afridi pulls, it goes up in the air close the square leg umpire but there's nobody there and they take a single
low full toss on off, pushed down straight for a single
low full toss on the pads, steered to deep midwicket for a single
short ball from round the stumps, Afridi pulls it just in time for a double to the square-leg area
full and outside off, Afridi drives to cover where a misfield gives them a single. Bad bounce for the fielder there
full on the pads, steered on the leg side for a single
low full toss  towards the feet, Afridi manages the bottom edge on the leg side
another full ball on the leg stump, this time Shehzad gets it away in the cow corner for a four, it just beat the fielder in the deep
in the block hole, Afridi manages a thick edge to short fine leg

slower length ball outside off and he's taken at long-on. Shehzad went hard at it and took the aerial route down the ground. Waller was just inside the boundary rope and did well to take a catch over his head. He tossed it back just in case he was going to topple over, but did not and completed it cleanly.
short of length outside off, driven to cover where the fielder gets a hand to it and the batsmen take a single
full and on the pads and Afridi has got enough on it to go over long-on. The fielder tried to catch this too but Afridi had hit it really hard
slower ball, short and outside off, Afridi tries to scoop it awkwardly over short third man but can't
another slower ball outside off, fuller this time, and Afridi pushes it to short third man for a single
low full toss on the pads, Afridi made a bit of room and smashed it straight down the ground for four
full and outside the leg stump, Afridi came down and chipped it to deep midwicket after a couple of bounces
short of length on middle, defended off the back foot by Ali for a single
almost in the block hole, Afridi went hard at it down the ground but Vitori stopped it in his follow through
full and on the stumps, driven to cover for a single. Afridi is asking for a new bat now
nearly in the block hole, Ali tucked it towards deep square leg and they scamper for two to keep Afridi on strike

short ball and Afridi hooks it in the air but it falls just wide of the fielder in the deep. Ali wasn't quick for the second and would have been runout had there been a direct hit at the non-striker's end
short ball, pulled to deep midwicket for a single
full and outside off, Ali tries to smash tit but can't connect
another short ball and Ali pulls it, taking his eyes off the ball in the end, he had just enough for it to beat the fielder at deep backward square leg
well outside off, Ali swings his arms and gets it towards weeper cover for two
Ali dances down the ground but can't connect with this one which was way outside off
